channel.title: Comments for 10 Beasts
channel.description: Top rated Techs, Products and Reviews

item.title: Comment on Best Electric Shavers 2017 – Buyer’s Guide by Pat
item.dc:creator: Pat
item.description: Excellent review. What's amazing is how much these cost. I had one picked out then started looking at reviews. It was never mentioned. Are these considered high end. Or just really good ones that do the job right?
item.content:encoded: Excellent review. What’s amazing is how much these cost. I had one picked out then started looking at reviews. It was never mentioned. Are these considered high end. Or just really good ones that do the job right?

item.title: Comment on Best Drone Cameras 2017 – Buyer’s Guide by Spenser
item.dc:creator: Spenser
item.description: I've used the DJI Mavic Pro for some months now. And it's way cooler than i had expected it to be. Seeing it on your list goes far to show how amazing the Dji mavi pro is.
item.content:encoded: I’ve used the DJI Mavic Pro for some months now. And it’s way cooler than i had expected it to be. Seeing it on your list goes far to show how amazing the Dji mavi pro is.

item.title: Comment on Best xBox Steering Wheel 2017 – 6 Steering Wheels Reviewed by James Moses

item.description: Nice to see the thrust master series included in your list.
item.content:encoded: Nice to see the thrust master series included in your list.

item.title: Comment on 40+ Tech Bloggers Reveal The 3 Best iPhone Accessories by Shoaib

item.title: Comment on iPhone or Android: Your Smartphone defines your Character by Ahyari
item.dc:creator: Ahyari
item.description: Android = so many brand using the OS = more people (1.4 billions). iOS = only Apple; but hit 505 millions World Wide? This is something!
item.content:encoded:
Android = so many brand using the OS = more people (1.4 billions).
iOS = only Apple; but hit 505 millions World Wide? This is something!

item.title: Comment on Best Gaming Mouse 2017 – Buyer’s Guide by Aww_PooSnax
item.dc:creator: Aww_PooSnax
item.description: Mine has the same issue many have had. The left click starts to go out (mine, after only a few months) and you start double-clicking everything, or not clicking at all.
item.content:encoded: Mine has the same issue many have had. The left click starts to go out (mine, after only a few months) and you start double-clicking everything, or not clicking at all.
